rooms.description: Open-plan living area with wheelchair accessible entrances and ample circulation space, large windows for natural light.
Contemporary open kitchen integrated with living area; includes wide counters and lower cabinets for wheelchair access.
Private bedroom designed with Vastu alignment, ensuring the bed is not placed in the direct line of entry for energy flow.
Wheelchair accessible bathroom with grab bars and non-slip surfaces, designed according to Vastu norms.
Compact storage closet integrated within the bedroom area for efficient space utilization.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible entry with a ramp, aligned with Vastu principles to ensure positive energy flow.
Secondary entrance providing emergency access, designed with accessibility in mind.
Small balcony attached to the bedroom, offering a private outdoor space.
